title: (x) Apex New like sans in Nintendo magazine - Corpid {Jelmar}
content:
I’m looking for this typeface that reads BEAST. I need help in identifying. It looks a lot like Apex New, but the uppercase A doesn’t match. If someone can please tell me the weight also, so I don’t have to buy the whole package. Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [beast.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204121409/http:/typophile.com/files/beast.png) | 168.15 KB |

 [‹ maintenance font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204121409/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46897 "Go to previous forum topic") [Serif from old Jack Daniel's ad ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204121409/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46889 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dontbugme

comments.content: [Indeed](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204121409/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/lucasfonts/corpid_c1s_black/?sample_text=BEAST!&sample_size=96), it is Corpid. What’s the magazine?
And then probably just regular for ’Unleash the’ and black for te ’BEAST!’ part.

Thanks for identifying. That’s just the font I was looking for.

The magazine is the Official Nintendo Magazine (ONM).
